realm.name: HAS_VIEW_DETAILS_ACCESS
realm.description: A user can view the details of each application in the record list.

realm.name: HAS_CHECK_APPLICATION_STATUS
realm.description: A user can check the application status section

realm.name: offline_access
realm.description: ${role_offline-access}

realm.name: inspector
realm.description: officers manning the checkpoints

realm.name: HAS_VIEW_APOR_TYPE_ACCESS
realm.description: A user can view all the APOR types

realm.name: HAS_BULK_UPLOAD_ACCESS
realm.description: A user can do bulk upload

realm.name: approver
realm.description: Approver Role

realm.name: uma_authorization
realm.description: ${role_uma_authorization}

realm.name: HAS_NOTIFY_ACCESS
realm.description: A user can resend notification to the user

realm.name: user
realm.description: Default User Role

realm.name: INSPECTOR
realm.description: Inspector Admin

realm.name: HAS_DELETE_APOR_TYPE_ACCESS
realm.description: A user can delete APOR types (APOR Code, Description, Agency)

realm.name: HAS_VIEW_RECORD_STATUS
realm.description: A user can only view the status in the Approval Action Column (PENDING, APPROVED, DENIED, REVOKED)

realm.name: HAS_UPDATE_APOR_TYPE_ACCESS
realm.description: A user can update the APOR type

realm.name: SUPPORT
realm.description: A user only has view access in the dashboard but he/she can see all the records regardless of APORTYPES

realm.name: registrant
realm.description: roles assigned to a users requesting for an access pass (aka rapid pass)

realm.name: HAS_EDIT_RECORD_ACCESS
realm.description: A user should be able to edit the record of the applicant

realm.name: HAS_ADD_APOR_TYPE_ACCESS
realm.description: A user can add an APOR Type (APOR Code, Description, Agency)

realm.name: HAS_REVOKE_ACCESS
realm.description: A user can revoke an application

realm.name: ADMINISTRATOR
realm.description: The administrator has access to all the features of the dashboard

realm.name: APPROVER
realm.description: Approving Agencies that can do mainly bulk upload and view records based on APOR Type

description: All scanner devices (checkpoint app users) are registered under this group.

clients.description: The client used for authenticating the RapidPass API Backend.

policies.name: Default Policy
policies.description: A policy that grants access only for users within this realm

// by default, grants any permission associated with this policy

policies.name: Default Permission
policies.description: A permission that applies to the default resource type

clientScopes.name: roles

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token
